Header: The IllankaiTamil Arasu Party backs Sajith
Content: The IllankaiTamil Arasu Party which is the largest in the Tamil National Alliance has decided to extend their support to Presidential Candidate Sajith Premadasa in the forthcoming presidential election. Parliamentarian M.A. Sumanthiran announced that their partyâ€™s Central Committee opted to support Sajith Premadasa without any condition. The discussion was held under the aegis of Leader of the Party Parliamentarian R. Sampanthan. Parliamentarians M.A. Sumanthiran and MavaiSenathirajah were present in the discussion in addition to several senior politicos of the party.
